thread.title: Jumeirah properties named among best reviewed hotels on the Expedia Insiders' Select 2015 list
thread.title_full: Jumeirah properties named among best reviewed hotels on the Expedia Insiders' Select 2015 list - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jumeirah properties named among best reviewed hotels on the Expedia Insiders' Select 2015 list
text:
Jumeirah properties named among best reviewed hotels on the Expedia Insiders’ Select 2015 list
Jumeirah Group, the global luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, is pleased to announce four hotels and resorts in the UAE have been named among the best reviewed hotels on The Expedia Insiders’ Select® 2015 List.
This year Jumeirah Dar Al Masyaf and Jumeirah Al Qasr at Madinat Jumeirah, Jumeirah Zabeel Saray and Jumeirah at Etihad Towers, Abu Dhabi all featured in the list which is compiled each year to recognise 650 of the best reviewed hotels around the world.
Robert Swade, Group Chief Operating Officer, Jumeirah Group, said: “We’re delighted that four Jumeirah hotels have been chosen in this year’s Expedia Insiders’ Select ranking which highlights the best hotels according to Expedia travellers. We aim to deliver the best possible overall experience for our guests and it is rewarding to see our commitment to superior customer service being recognised.”
The results are based on nearly two million annual verified guest reviews of the 290,000 properties available on the website. Consumers can rely on Expedia’s unmatched traveller insight and local market destination expertise to help them make confident booking decisions.
Source: Jumeirah.
